casebody.data:
PANDUIT CORP., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. BAND-IT-IDEX, INC., Defendant-Appellant. No. 00-1492. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: Nov. 20, 2001.

Before GAJARSA, Circuit Judge, ARCHER, Senior Circuit Judge, and LINN, Circuit Judge.

*837 Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R.36.
